      • convertMessageFromShortcut

        private java.lang.String convertMessageFromShortcut(java.lang.String message)
        Its kind of disguise.it will convert the message from the patient in a way that the application will think that the patient has directly enquired using the code instead of going through menu

        For ex:Patient query:GET MENU XYZ 2 will get converted to GET REG

        Parameters:
        message -
        Returns:
        converted message
